systems.name: Arcane Weave
systems.description: Intellectual, formulaic magic that imposes the caster's will upon the Aether through precise gestures, runes, and incantations.
systems.rules: Requires verbal, somatic, and material components. Limited by caster's knowledge and mental endurance.
systems.limitations: Aether Burn from overcasting, requires years of study, cannot create permanent life
systems.components: Verbal (incantations), Somatic (gestures), Material (focus items like wands or rare components)
systems.dangers: Backlash from failed spells, mental exhaustion, attracting unwanted attention from otherworldly beings
systems.history: Developed by ancient elves and refined by human wizards over millennia
